name: Consus
headline: Your single source of truth for government documents
description: Consus is your single source of truth for government specifications, standards, or handbooks. We verify the active revision of documents, notify you when documents are updated, and make it easy to extract the relevant information. Win new business or execute existing contracts faster with Consus.

founders.name: Eric Magliarditi, Founder
founders.description:
Let's transform government requirements. 

I spent most of my career launching government satellites at SpaceX. Before that, I wrote software to analyze satellite constellations and built computer vision models at MIT.

# GOVERNMENTREQUIREMENTSSOLVED
Learn More![Backed by Y Combinator](https://www.consus.io/yc_badge_white.png)
## THEONE-STOP-SHOPFORGOVERNMENTDOCUMENTS
### Catch every document update instantly.
### Generate insights with smart data extraction.
### Export critical requirements in one click.
Get StartedAbout Us
![About Consus](https://www.consus.io/about_us_bw.png)
### Working with the government doesn't need to slow you down
Companies are losing contract opportunities, hiring non-value added staff, and perpetually re-performing engineering tasks - all because navigating government specifications has become nearly impossible. Our team has years of domain experience and built a solution that makes it simple to extract, analyze, and act on critical requirements. Consus saves you time, money, and helps you win new business.
We will continue to expand our platform with innovative features and product offerings, designed to make winning and executing government contracts easy. Our roadmap includes advanced analytics tools, automated compliance checking, and integrated project management capabilities - all aimed at helping organizations like yours succeed in the government contracting space.
![Consus Logo](https://www.consus.io/consus_logo_light.png)

generated_description:
**Consus: Your Single Source of Truth for Government Documents**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch F24, Consus is on a mission to solve a growing problem in government contracting: navigating the labyrinth of specifications, standards, and handbooks. Based in a yet-to-be-named location and currently a lean operation with just one employee, Consus aims to streamline how businesses manage their government-related documents.

At its core, Consus is about clarity and efficiency. The company provides a platform that confirms the active revision of documents, sends notifications when updates happen, and simplifies the extraction of critical information. This means that businesses can win new contracts or execute existing ones faster and with fewer headaches. 

Consus believes that companies are losing out on valuable contract opportunities and wasting resources due to the cumbersome nature of government documentation. By developing a smart data extraction tool, they help organizations shed the non-value-added activities that slow them down. With a roadmap that includes advanced analytics, automated compliance checking, and project management features, Consus aims to equip its users with everything they need to succeed in the complex world of government contracts.

If you’re looking for a way to navigate the often murky waters of government specifications with ease, Consus is designed to be the one-stop-shop you need. Check out their website at [consus.io](https://www.consus.io) to learn more about their innovative solutions.
